cyclone.name: GRACE
cyclone.current_location: about 55 miles southwest of St. Croix, U.S. Virgin Islands
cyclone.trajectory: tracking west-northwest across the northeastern Caribbean toward Hispaniola and later Cuba

weather_observation.watch_coast: North coast of the Dominican Republic and the entire coast of Haiti (tropical-storm watch)
weather_observation.warning_coast: U.S. Virgin Islands, Puerto Rico (including Vieques and Culebra), and Dominican Republic from the southern Haitian border to Samaná (tropical-storm warning)
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Northern Leeward Islands, U.S. Virgin Islands, Puerto Rico, Hispaniola, Turks & Caicos, southeastern Bahamas, eastern Cuba
weather_observation.wind: Tropical storm winds (around 40 mph, higher gusts) possible Sunday as the center passes just southwest of St. Croix.
weather_observation.rainfall: Heavy rain of 3–6 inches with locally higher amounts could cause flash and urban flooding on St. Croix.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Rough seas and dangerous marine conditions for vessel operations.
